text: Kaadu Qaad kee Samuud deqsita mara finqisneeh, nummah keenit abne finqi siinih baxxaqqa iyye ken buxaaxiy baytey keenik foyyah raqtel. Kaadu sheetan ken uma taamoomi keenit bilqiseeh, cakki gitak ken waaseh, usun sinni koroosannuu kee sinni uma taamoomi yable marah sugeenih immay woh nummayse mara makkon sinni nafsi-fayxi kataateenikkal
